definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly

sentences.english: Among working dog people, you will hear a lot of talk about drives.
sentences.chinese: 在工作犬友中，你會聽到很多“驅力”的談論。

sentences.english: Interest, attention and drive are all expressions of libido.
sentences.chinese: 興趣，注意力及慾望驅力，都是力比多的表達。

sentences.english: When a dog is in defense drive, he is displaying aggressive behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 處於防禦驅力下的犬隻，將表現出進攻性行爲。

sentences.english: And yet, according to the MRI, my libido is surprisingly strong.
sentences.chinese: 然而，根據核磁共振成像，我的性驅力出人意料的強。

sentences.english: would be to teach ordinary Americans how to control their unconscious drives.
sentences.chinese: 將是去教授普通美國人，如何控制他們的無意識驅力。

sentences.english: The circuit of the drive is the only way for the subject to transgress the pleasure principle.
sentences.chinese: 驅力的迴圈是最好的方法，讓主體逾越快樂原則。

sentences.english: Callie and Thunder both have roughly the same degree of defense drive.
sentences.chinese: 佳麗和雷電大致擁有同樣程度的防禦性驅力。

sentences.english: Think of each drive being on a continuum.
sentences.chinese: 要把每種驅力視爲一個連續統。

sentences.english: Lacan maintains Freud's distinction between drive (Trieb) and instinct (Instinkt).
sentences.chinese: 拉康主張，弗洛伊德區別驅力與本能的差異。

definition: lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1

definition: ājñā or ajna, the brow or third eye chakra 查克拉, residing in the forehead/also written 眉間輪|眉间轮[mei2 jian1 lun2]

pinyin: duo1 yuan2 wen2 hua4 zhu3 yi4

definition: Jian Zoupianfeng, pseudonym of prolific modern novelist
the sword moves with side stroke (modern idiom)/fig. unexpected winning move/unconventional gambit
mūlādhāra or muladhara, the root or Saturn chakra 查克拉, residing in the coccyx
